name: Neon Clouds
description:
2D stealth platformer. Run through the levels and avoid the lights!

Submission for Mini Jam 63: Future.

Controls:

  • A/D - move left/right
  • SPACE - jump
  • left SHIFT - dash
  • SPACE + A/D - walljump while sliding down a wall

Credits:

  • Art: kazuairgear3
  • Programming: Genthus
  • Song used: Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata by @Joth_Music
